EmailTemplate.name: 18-Bus @ Cloud Spd-Peering Engineering-Email-APRICOTEmailers-T003LW.Email - Remi
EmailTemplate.subject: APRICOT kicks off today. Meet us there?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> APRICOT kicks off today. Meet us there? Making insight-driven IP real Daejeon Convention Center, South Korea Visit our booth # 9 in Hall 109 & 110 at APRICOT from February 18 - 28 to see how we are making inside-driven IP networks real. Find out how we can help you implement high performance IP networks that are massively scalable, highly automated and secure while also being cost efficient. Meet our technical experts and see our demonstrations of:
- Automated peering engineering <[[http://pf.content.nokia.com/apricot2019/automated-peering-engineering?lb_email=%7b%7blead.Email%20Address%7d%7d&did=d000000001b5&utm_campaign=peering_engineering&utm_source=email-list-marketo_apricot&utm_medium=email&utm_content=reminder&utm_term=peering]]>, using Nokia Deepfield network analytics and the Network Services Platform to automate the network peering edge - Insight-driven DDoS mitigation <[[http://pf.content.nokia.com/apricot2019/deepfield-analytics-ddos?lb_email=%7b%7blead.Email%20Address%7d%7d&did=d000000001b6&utm_campaign=peering_engineering&utm_source=email-list-marketo_apricot&utm_medium=email&utm_content=reminder&utm_term=ddos]]>, using Nokia Deepfield network analytics and Nokia routers with FP4 silicon to protect against DDoS attacks. Nokia at APRICOT 2019: Segment Routing for DCI <[[https://2019.apricot.net/program/presentations/#segment-routing-for-dci]]>
Pete Moyer, IP Consulting Engineer, Nokia Muhammad Durrani, Chief Network Architect, Equinix
Internet Traffic 2009-2019 <[[https://2019.apricot.net/program/presentations/#internet-traffic-2009-2019]]>
Craig Labovitz, General Manager, Nokia Deepfield
5G technology: a tutorial <[[https://2019.apricot.net/program/presentations/#5-g-technology-a-tutorial]]>
Paresh Khatri, Chief Architect, ION APAC, Nokia View the event page: APRICOT 2019 <[[https://2019.apricot.net/]]> Â© {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Twitter}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Linkedin}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Facebook}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Youtube}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Blog}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
